item.title: Report X-2024060622
item.description:
Report X-2024060622

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-24T15:13:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-10
  • City: BELGRADE
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Package was leaking a resin which made the package itself very wet and sticky but did not spread past that. This package arrived to the Bozeman facility in this state and was not the result of human error at this facility. The package was put in a lined tote immediately and minimal cleanup was required as leak was almost entirely contained to the origin box itself. The leak was at the top of the box meaning it was mishandled before arriving here.
